# Autonomist Republican Bloc

| foundation   =
| dissolved    =
| ideology     = RepublicanismCatalanism
| position     =
| state        = Spain
}}
The Autonomist Republican Bloc (, BRA) was a Catalanist political party during the Spanish Restoration period, that existed between 1915 and 1917. It merged, together with the Republican Nationalist Federal Union (UFNR), into the Catalan Republican Party.
